Railway Officer Trainee (見習鐵路主任) (ref: M18282)

To cope with the expansion of our railway network in Hong Kong, we are looking for people with passion for railway operations to join our Railway Officer Trainee (ROT) programme.

You should be proactive, capable and customer-oriented, with unreserved dedication to deliver quality service to the public and contribute to our expanding business. Subject to your background and work experience, the training period will be around 1-2 years. Upon successful completion of training, you will be appointed to a senior supervisory position.

You should be a Degree holder with at least 1 year’s experience in an operational, transport and/or customer service environment. Good command of English and Chinese (including Putonghua) is a must. Strong communication, people and risk management skills, and a customer-centric and positive mindset are essential.

You are invited to apply online via http://www.mtr.com.hk/mtr_job_en on or before 3 May 2018. Only online applications via our corporate website will be accepted.
